Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.
